game.name: Filthium Zero
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Filthium Zero is a single-player action roguelite featuring a mix of vertical and ground combat. Purge the Filthium-infested zones of Earth, battle hordes of mutants, unlock powerful upgrades to survive, and watch the ragdolls fly.
